# restoreTrainingSession(sessionParameters:)

**Type Method**

Recreates an asynchronous hand pose classifier’s training session by restoring its saved state from the file system.

## Declaration

```swift
static func restoreTrainingSession(sessionParameters: MLTrainingSessionParameters) throws -> MLTrainingSession<MLHandPoseClassifier>
```

## Parameters

- **sessionParameters**: The same [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLTrainingSessionParameters] instance that created an existing training session.

## Return Value

An [doc://com.apple.createml/documentation/CreateML/MLTrainingSession] that represents the hand pose classifier training session.

## Training a hand pose classifier asynchronously

- **train(trainingData:parameters:sessionParameters:)**: Begins an asynchronous hand pose classifier’s training session.
- **makeTrainingSession(trainingData:parameters:sessionParameters:)**: Creates an asynchronous hand pose classifier’s training session.
- **resume(_:)**: Begins or continues an asynchronous hand pose classifier’s training session.
